Service Details: - Provides shelter, care, and adoption of domestic animals- Responds to concerns of cruelty and neglect- Sells RDCO Dog Licences- Partners with Okanagan Cat Coalition providing humane trapping, neutering, and return or rehoming services for community cats in Central Okanagan- Operates under the Provincial Legislation Protection of Cruelty to Animals (PCA) Act
